name: Cynodon't
description:
A game thrown together in Unity (first time using it!) for Ludum Dare 50. Theme was "delaying the inevitable" and my mind sprang to dinosaurs for whatever reason. The mammals (cynodonts) are meant to escape with the eggs, but the build broke that feature, so just go chomp on 'em.

Enjoy!

Move with WASD and use SPACE to bite.
